name: Mysterious Shrine
text: A glowing shrine hums with power. Strange symbols pulse across its surface.

choices.label: Touch the shrine
choices.desc: Gain a random relic, but gain a random curse

choices.label: Offer 25 gold
choices.desc: Pay tribute for an uncommon relic

choices.label: Walk away
choices.desc: Leave the shrine undisturbed

name: Wounded Knight
text: A knight lies bleeding by the road. He clutches a heavy purse.

choices.label: Help him
choices.desc: Spend 15 gold to heal him — he may join your cause

choices.label: Rob him
choices.desc: Take his gold (+30) but gain a curse

choices.label: Ignore
choices.desc: Continue on your way

name: Witch's Bargain
text: A cackling witch offers you a deal from her bubbling cauldron.

choices.label: Remove a curse
choices.desc: She'll cleanse one curse from you

choices.label: Upgrade a relic
choices.desc: Transform a common relic into something better

choices.label: Decline
choices.desc: Best not to deal with witches

name: Abandoned Armory
text: You discover a dusty armory filled with old weapons and armor.

choices.label: Take weapon
choices.desc: Gain +4 combat damage relic

choices.label: Take shield
choices.desc: Gain +20 HP relic

choices.label: Sell it all
choices.desc: Gain 40 gold

name: Dark Ritual
text: A circle of dark runes glows on the ground. Power radiates from within.

choices.label: Sacrifice health
choices.desc: All heroes lose 30 HP this run, gain a rare relic

choices.label: Decline
choices.desc: The darkness isn't worth the risk

name: Goblin Gambler
text: A goblin with a toothy grin challenges you: 'Bet 20 gold! Double or nothing!'

choices.label: Accept the bet
choices.desc: 50% chance to win 40 gold, 50% to lose 20

choices.label: Decline
choices.desc: You don't trust goblins

name: Traveling Merchant
text: A merchant with a mysterious cart waves you over. 'Special deals today!'

choices.label: Buy mystery box
choices.desc: Pay 30 gold for a random uncommon or rare relic

choices.label: Trade a relic
choices.desc: Give a common relic, get a random uncommon

choices.label: Browse and leave
choices.desc: Nothing catches your eye

name: Ancient Well
text: An ancient well with runes carved around its rim. You can hear whispers from below.

choices.label: Toss a coin
choices.desc: Pay 10 gold — something good may happen

choices.label: Drink the water
choices.desc: Heal all heroes to full HP

choices.label: Leave it alone
choices.desc: Some wells are best left undisturbed

name: Wandering Blacksmith
text: A blacksmith offers to improve your equipment for a modest fee.

choices.label: Upgrade a relic
choices.desc: Pay 20 gold to enhance one relic by +50%

choices.label: New weapon
choices.desc: Gain a random common relic

choices.label: No thanks
choices.desc: Your equipment is fine

name: Cursed Chest
text: A chest covered in thorny vines. The lock is rusted but the contents gleam.

choices.label: Force it open
choices.desc: Gain a rare relic but also a curse

choices.label: Pick the lock
choices.desc: Pay 15 gold to open safely — gain an uncommon relic

choices.label: Leave it
choices.desc: Not worth the risk

name: Destroyed War Camp
text: You find the remains of a war camp. Supplies are scattered everywhere.

choices.label: Scavenge supplies
choices.desc: Gain 25 gold from the wreckage

choices.label: Search for weapons
choices.desc: Gain a random common relic

name: Fortune Teller
text: A hooded figure peers into a crystal ball. 'I see your future... for a price.'

choices.label: Pay 20 gold
choices.desc: Gain +2 trajectory dots and learn enemy weakness

choices.label: Refuse
choices.desc: You make your own destiny
